description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人，曾任中共中央总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军委主席，是中国共产党第四代中央领导集体的核心人物。
description.en: A former paramount leader of the People's Republic of China, who served as General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He was the core figure of the fourth generation of Chinese Communist Party leadership.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人，中共第三代中央领导集体的核心。
description.en: A former paramount leader of the People's Republic of China, and the core of the third generation of Chinese Communist Party leadership.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国现任主要领导人，中共第五代中央领导集体的核心。
description.en: The current paramount leader of the People's Republic of China, and the core of the fifth generation of Chinese Communist Party leadership.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛的夫人，曾任北京市城乡规划委员会副主任。
description.en: Wife of Hu Jintao, former deputy director of the Beijing Urban Planning Commission.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛的父亲。
description.en: Father of Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛的儿子，现任中华人民共和国民政部副部长。
description.en: Son of Hu Jintao, currently the Vice Minister of Civil Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党前高级领导人，曾任中共中央政治局常委。他被认为是胡锦涛的政治导师。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Chinese Communist Party, who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee. He is considered a political mentor to Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人，曾任中共中央委员会总书记。
description.en: A former paramount leader of the People's Republic of China, who served as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心，中华人民共和国的实际最高领导人。
description.en: The core of the second generation of Chinese Communist Party leadership and the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前国务院总理，与胡锦涛共同主政时期被称为“胡温体制”。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, whose tenure alongside Hu Jintao is known as the "Hu-Wen Administration".

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，前中华民国副总统及中国国民党主席。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former Vice President of the Republic of China and Chairman of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，亲民党创党主席。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, founding chairman of the People First Party.

description.zh-cn: 前中共上海市委书记，因腐败问题在胡锦涛任内被查处。
description.en: Former Party Secretary of Shanghai, who was investigated and removed from office for corruption during Hu Jintao's tenure.

description.zh-cn: 前中共重庆市委书记，因严重违纪问题在胡锦涛任内被查处。
description.en: Former Party Secretary of Chongqing, who was investigated and removed from office for serious disciplinary violations during Hu Jintao's tenure.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的著名高等学府，胡锦涛的母校。
description.en: A prestigious institution of higher education in Beijing, China, and Hu Jintao's alma mater.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛就读过的高中。
description.en: The high school that Hu Jintao attended.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导人职务。
description.en: The highest leading position within the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家元首。
description.en: The head of state of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央军事委员会主席

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会主席

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会的最高领导职务，是中国人民解放军的最高统帅。
description.en: The highest leading position of the Central Military Commission of the Chinese Communist Party, and the supreme commander of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会主席

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会主席

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会的最高领导职务。
description.en: The highest leading position of the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央军事委员会副主席

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会副主席

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会的副职领导职务。
description.en: The deputy leading position of the Central Military Commission of the Chinese Communist Party.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会副主席

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会副主席

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会的副职领导职务。
description.en: The deputy leading position of the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国副主席

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家副元首。
description.en: The deputy head of state of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党培养党的高级领导干部的学校。
description.en: The school for training senior officials of the Chinese Communist Party.

nodes.id: 中国共产党西藏自治区委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党西藏自治区委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在西藏自治区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in the Tibet Autonomous Region.

nodes.id: 中国共产党贵州省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党贵州省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在贵州省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in Guizhou Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产主义青年团中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团的全国领导机构。
description.en: The national leading body of the Communist Youth League of China.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛的出生地，今江苏省泰州市。
description.en: Hu Jintao's birthplace, now Taizhou City, Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 1989年3月在西藏自治区首府拉萨市发生的一系列骚乱事件。
description.en: A series of riots that took place in Lhasa, the capital of the Tibet Autonomous Region, in March 1989.

description.zh-cn: 指胡锦涛担任中共中央总书记和温家宝担任国务院总理期间的中国政治时期。
description.en: Refers to the period of Chinese politics when Hu Jintao was General Secretary of the CCP and Wen Jiabao was Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 2002年末至2003年在中国及全球发生的严重急性呼吸系统综合症（SARS）疫情。
description.en: The outbreak of Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS) that occurred in China and globally from late 2002 to 2003.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前卫生部部长，因2003年SARS事件被免职。
description.en: Former Minister of Health of the People's Republic of China, who was dismissed due to the 2003 SARS outbreak.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任北京市市长，因2003年SARS事件被免职。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Mayor of Beijing and was dismissed due to the 2003 SARS outbreak.

nodes.id: 胡锦涛二十大离场事件

zh-cn: 胡锦涛二十大离场事件

description.zh-cn: 指胡锦涛在2022年10月22日中共二十大闭幕会议期间被工作人员带离会场的事件。
description.en: Refers to the incident where Hu Jintao was escorted out of the closing session of the 20th National Congress of the CCP on October 22, 2022.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛与刘永清于1970年结婚，两人是清华大学水利工程系的同窗。
description.en: Hu Jintao and Liu Yongqing married in 1970; they were classmates in the Department of Hydraulic Engineering at Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 胡静之是胡锦涛的父亲。
description.en: Hu Jingzhi is the father of Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 李文瑞是胡锦涛的母亲。
description.en: Li Wenrui is the mother of Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 胡海青是胡锦涛的女儿。
description.en: Hu Haiqing is the daughter of Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 胡海峰是胡锦涛的儿子。
description.en: Hu Haifeng is the son of Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 1959年至1965年，胡锦涛在清华大学水利工程系学习。
description.en: From 1959 to 1965, Hu Jintao studied at the Department of Hydraulic Engineering at Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 1956年至1959年，胡锦涛在江苏省泰州中学读高中。
description.en: From 1956 to 1959, Hu Jintao attended Jiangsu Taizhou High School.

description.zh-cn: 宋平在胡锦涛的政治生涯早期赏识并提拔他，并于1992年向中央推荐胡锦涛进入中共中央政治局常委会。
description.en: Song Ping appreciated and promoted Hu Jintao early in his political career, and in 1992, recommended him to the Central Committee to enter the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平将胡锦涛指定为江泽民的接班人，为胡锦涛日后成为最高领导人奠定了基础。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping designated Hu Jintao as Jiang Zemin's successor, laying the foundation for Hu to later become the paramount leader.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共西藏自治区党委书记的胡锦涛果断处置了1989年的拉萨骚乱，恢复了社会秩序。
description.en: As the then Party Secretary of the Tibet Autonomous Region, Hu Jintao decisively handled the 1989 Lhasa riots and restored social order.

position.zh-cn: 中央书记处书记、国家副主席、中共中央军委副主席
position.en: Secretary of the Central Secretariat, Vice President, Vice Chairman of the CCP Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 在成为最高领导人之前，胡锦涛在江泽民的领导下担任了中央书记处书记、国家副主席、中央军委副主席等多个职务。
description.en: Before becoming the paramount leader, Hu Jintao served in multiple positions under Jiang Zemin, including Secretary of the Central Secretariat, Vice President, and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
中国共产党中央军事委员会主席
中华人民共和国中央军事委员会主席
中国共产党西藏自治区委员会
中国共产党贵州省委员会

description.zh-cn: 习近平在中共十八大后接替胡锦涛，成为中国最高领导人。
description.en: Xi Jinping succeeded Hu Jintao as the paramount leader of China after the 18th CCP National Congress.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛与时任国务院总理温家宝共同主政，该时期被称为“胡温体制”。
description.en: Hu Jintao and then-Premier Wen Jiabao led the government together, a period known as the "Hu-Wen Administration".

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛政府在2003年果断处置非典疫情，并撤换了相关瞒报疫情的官员。
description.en: The Hu Jintao administration decisively handled the SARS outbreak in 2003 and dismissed officials responsible for concealing the epidemic.

description.zh-cn: 因在SARS事件初期隐瞒疫情，时任卫生部部长张文康被胡锦涛政府免职。
description.en: Due to concealing the epidemic during the initial stages of the SARS outbreak, then-Minister of Health Zhang Wenkang was dismissed by the Hu Jintao administration.

description.zh-cn: 因在SARS事件初期隐瞒疫情，时任北京市市长孟学农被胡锦涛政府免职。
description.en: Due to concealing the epidemic during the initial stages of the SARS outbreak, then-Mayor of Beijing Meng Xuenong was dismissed by the Hu Jintao administration.

description.zh-cn: 2005年，胡锦涛与时任中国国民党主席连战在北京会面，这是60年来国共两党最高领导人的首次会晤。
description.en: In 2005, Hu Jintao met with then-Kuomintang Chairman Lien Chan in Beijing, marking the first meeting between the top leaders of the CCP and KMT in 60 years.

description.zh-cn: 2005年，胡锦涛在北京会见了时任亲民党主席宋楚瑜。
description.en: In 2005, Hu Jintao met with then-People First Party Chairman James Soong in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 在胡锦涛任内，时任中共上海市委书记陈良宇因腐败问题被调查并免职。
description.en: During Hu Jintao's tenure, then-Shanghai Party Secretary Chen Liangyu was investigated and dismissed for corruption.

description.zh-cn: 在胡锦涛任期即将结束时，时任中共重庆市委书记薄熙来因严重违纪问题被调查并免职。
description.en: Near the end of Hu Jintao's term, then-Chongqing Party Secretary Bo Xilai was investigated and dismissed for serious disciplinary violations.

relationships.source: 胡锦涛二十大离场事件

description.zh-cn: 在中共二十大闭幕会上，胡锦涛被工作人员带离会场，引发外界广泛关注。
description.en: At the closing session of the 20th CCP National Congress, Hu Jintao was escorted out of the venue by staff, drawing widespread international attention.
